title: OUR DIRTY LITTLE SECRETS (I Know What You're Doing #2)
description: Life changes, rearranges. But sometimes in the most unexpected ways.  Both Jenna and I had our own dirty little secrets, but little did we know they were about to tear our marriage apart.  Watching me play still held it's excitement for Jenna, but what will happen when she learns, at least for one of us, emotions are involved.
author: Zane Michaelson
